name: NM Font Awesome
author: Mykhailo Nykoliuk

sections.description:
NM Font Awersome makes it easy to add vector icons and social logos from Font Awesome to your website. And version 5 is redesigned and built from the ground up!

Usage

Font Awesome version 5 icons can be any of 4 different styles, each with its own prefix.
In the free version of the plugin, you can use only 2 styles:
* Solid, with style prefix fas
* Brands, with style prefix fab

Read the documentation Additional Styling Classes to use the plug-in’s features 100%.

NM Font Awersome gives you 2 ways of usage:

1) SHORTCODE

[nm_fa name="fas fa-camera-retro"]

[nm_fa name="fas fa-camera-retro fa-2x"]

[nm_fa name="fas fa-cog fa-spin"]

Where the name is the name of the class of the icon that you want to add.

A complete list of icons you can find on Font Awesome.

2) TINYMCE

Select the desired icon in the drop-down menu.

3) HTML

To access the HTML editor, click on the “HTML” link on the tab at the top right of the text editor window in WordPress.
If you don\’t know how to use Font Awesome in HTML, you can read Font Awesome Basic Use.

Coming soon

In the near future there will be a PRO version, where you can use all Awesome Icons.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Unzip the nm-font-awesome.zip folder, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Upload the nm-font-awesome folder to your /wp-content/plugins directory.
  3. In your WordPress dashboard, head over to the Plugins section.
  4. Activate NM Font Awesome.
sections.faq:
If you have questions, suggestions or idea for development.

Send me an email to misha.nykoliuk@gmail.com and I will answer you as soon as I can.

short_description: Wordpress plugin that adds the latest version 5 of Font Awesome into your WordPress project.
